name: Sea Anenemies
description:
Sea Anenemies Details

1-2 player game where you move pieces on a board with actions based on the role of a 7 side dice. When a piece reaches the other side it is upgraded to move in any direction.

How To Play

Select a piece, then select one of the available spots to move.  Remove an opponent's piece by moving one of your own into it's place. Win the game by removing all of your opponent's pieces.

Note

Currently the ai just makes random moves, I wasn't able to get it finished in time :'(

Credits

Art provided by kenney
